comments:
Build ID: WTP 2.0

Steps To Reproduce:
In a product based on WTP
1. dropped the plugin org.eclipse.team.examples.filesystem (3.3 version). I have attached the plugin for convenience.
2. Started product with -clean
3. Create a Enterprise application project of j2ee version 1.4
4. Right click on project and choose "Team" -> "Share Project" -> Choose the Pessimistic File adapter.
5. Select all directories and files in Navigator view (some files may be hidden in other views) and choose 'Team - Add to control'
6. Once that is done, select the project, right click and choose Team-Checkin
7. Now create an application client project (do not choose to add to ear) make sure version is 1.4.
8. Now right click on ear project , properties-J2ee module dependencies. CHECK the app client project. Hit ok.
Hit ok on any resource checkout dialog.
9. Now right click on ear project , properties-J2ee module dependencies. UNCHECK the app client project. Hit ok.
Hit ok on any resource checkout dialog. Get exception 

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jface 4 0 2007-06-22 12:55:42.843
